Title: FilteringDataGrid for WPF
Description: Filtering the WPF DataGrid automatically via the header (inline filtering) like you see in DevExpress / Telerik.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Filtering the WPF DataGrid automatically via the header (inline filtering) like you see in DevExpress / Telerik.

Features



This grid actually has 3 states:
  • Normal: No filtering applied and mouse is not hovering the header
  • Hover: Mouse is hovering the header and it's possible to add some filtering
  • MouseOut: The mouse has left the header and filtering is applied (filter is shown in the header)

This is a regular control, so after it's databound there's nothing left to do.
The filtering functionallity is fully automatic.

This project is no longer active.
